COSMOS 2023 Schedule

Tuesday July 4th - Friday July 7th, all times are CET

  • Tuesday: poster session/reception takes place in the Center for Visual Computing of Collectives (Building ZT, University of Konstanz). A layout of the University Campus can be found here
  • Wednesday and Thursday: all sessions are held in Bodensee Forum, Reichenaustraße 21, 78467 Konstanz.
  • Friday: all sessions will be in Senatssaal – V 1001, University of Konstanz, Building V, Universitätsstraße 10, 78464 Konstanz.
